languages.text: "Также я не могу не поблагодарить вас, Ваша Светлость, за милость, проявленную к хору. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Ваши дары капелле{/d} вдохнули силу в душу каждого астропата, дали им силы для борьбы, став еще одной спасительной нитью во мгле".

traits.locale_text: "Также я не могу не поблагодарить вас, Ваша Светлость, ибо на протяжении всего ритуала внимал я ясным голосам хора, что лучились сиянием звезд — как никогда ярким… То {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}ваши дары капелле{/d} вдохнули силу в душу каждого астропата, став еще одной спасительной нитью во мгле".

languages.text: "Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have bolstered the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."
languages.original_text: "Также я не могу не поблагодарить вас, Ваша Светлость, за милость, проявленную к хору. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Ваши дары капелле{/d} вдохнули силу в душу каждого астропата, дали им силы для борьбы, став еще одной спасительной нитью во мгле".

traits.locale_text: "Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have breathed strength into the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."

"Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have breathed strength into the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."

"Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have breathed strength into the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."

"Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have bolstered the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."

"Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have bolstered the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."

"Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have bolstered the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."

languages.text: «No tengo palabras para agradecerle los favores que ha dispensado al Coro, mi{mf|lord|lady}. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Su generosidad con la capilla{/d} ha fortalecido el espíritu de los Astrópatas, infundiéndoles el brío necesario para luchar y extendiéndoles la salvación de una mano amiga en la oscuridad».
languages.original_text: "Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have bolstered the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo palabras para agradecerle los favores que ha dispensado al Coro, mi{mf|lord|lady}. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Su generosidad con la capilla{/d} ha fortalecido el espíritu de los Astrópatas, infundiéndoles el brío necesario para luchar y extendiéndoles la salvación de una mano amiga en la oscuridad».

languages.text: 「聖歌隊へのご好意には感謝してもしきれません、陛下。{d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}礼拝堂へのあなたの贈り物{/d}は、すべての感応通信官の魂を強め、戦う力を与え、暗闇の中でもうひとつの命綱を伸ばしました」
languages.original_text: "Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have bolstered the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."

traits.locale_text: 「聖歌隊へのご好意には感謝してもしきれません、陛下。{d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}礼拝堂へのあなたの贈り物{/d}は、すべての感応通信官の魂を強め、戦う力を与え、暗闇の中でもうひとつの命綱を伸ばしました」

languages.text: “而且，我必须感谢您，大人，感谢您对唱诗班的关照。{d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}您为小教堂带来的礼物{/d}支撑着每位星语者的灵魂，赐予了他们战斗的力量，在黑暗之中拉起了新的救生索。”
languages.original_text: "Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have bolstered the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."

traits.locale_text: “而且，我必须感谢您，大人，感谢您对唱诗班的关照。{d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}您为小教堂带来的礼物{/d}支撑着每位星语者的灵魂，赐予了他们战斗的力量，在黑暗之中拉起了新的救生索。”

languages.text: "Überdies muss ich Euch danken, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, für die Gunst, die Ihr dem Chor erwiesen habt. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Eure Gaben für die Kapelle{/d} haben die Seelen aller Astropathen gestärkt und ihnen die Kraft gegeben, zu kämpfen und sich auch weiterhin in die Dunkelheit zu wagen."
languages.original_text: "Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have bolstered the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Überdies muss ich Euch danken, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, für die Gunst, die Ihr dem Chor erwiesen habt. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Eure Gaben für die Kapelle{/d} haben die Seelen aller Astropathen gestärkt und ihnen die Kraft gegeben, zu kämpfen und sich auch weiterhin in die Dunkelheit zu wagen."

languages.text: « Je dois également vous remercier, Votre Seigneurie, d'avoir fait une telle faveur au chœur.{d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Vos offrandes à la chapelle{/d} ont redonné force et courage aux astropathes et leur ont permis de trouver une lueur d'espoir dans cet océan d'obscurité. »
languages.original_text: "Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have bolstered the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois également vous remercier, Votre Seigneurie, d'avoir fait une telle faveur au chœur.{d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Vos offrandes à la chapelle{/d} ont redonné force et courage aux astropathes et leur ont permis de trouver une lueur d'espoir dans cet océan d'obscurité. »

languages.text: "Koro'ya sağladığınız imtiyaz neticesinde size teşekkür etmemek olmaz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Şapele verdiğiniz hediyeler{/d}, tüm Astropatlara moral oldu. Onlara savaşacak kuvvet verdi, karanlıkta yol gösterecek bir ışık oldu."
languages.original_text: "Nor can I fail to thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the favour you have shown the Choir. {d|Encyclopedia:AstropathCare}Your gifts to the chapel{/d} have bolstered the soul of every Astropath, given them the strength to fight, extending another lifeline in the darkness."
